description: Video games Tracker Notion Template | Midnight EditionAre you having trouble remembering all the video games you've ever played? This games tracker can help! You can quickly find what games you're currently playing, the games you've already beaten, and the games you want to try out next. With this tracker, you'll never have to worry about forgetting the games you've played before. features: Click on your profile icon in the bottom left corner of the Notion workspace.; Select "Settings" from the drop-down menu.; Scroll down to the "Appearance" section and select "Dark Mode".; Enjoy your new dark-themed Notion workspace!; Email:nicoledemarchi22@gmail.com
